name: Miscellaneous Motifs
pages: Miscellaneous Motifs are of those that dont fall into the other categories: they usually dont interact with the stack, most of the time.

pages.title: Peeker Motif
pages.text: display the stack to you.$(br2)$(1)$(l)G, F, G, E, C $()$(1)$(br)[] -> [] miscellaneous$(br)$(2)will always execute.

pages.title: Harmonic Motif
pages.text: measure the essence in the chunk, and display it to you.$(br2)$(1)$(l)D, F, E, D $()$(1)$(br)[] -> [] miscellaneous$(br)$(6)ocarina and above:$(2) will always execute.

pages.title: Programmer's Motif
pages.text: Debugger Spell, disabled in normal gameplay.$(br2)$(1)$(l)? $()$(1)$(br)[?] -> [?] miscellaneous$(br)$(4)will never execute.
